column1: Local Foods////Local Foods is one of my go-to lunch spots! I am absolutely in love with their pretzel bun and will always substitute it on any sandwich I get there. The crunchy chicken is one of my favorites and so is the truffled egg salad. Their lemongrass chicken soup is always on point
column2: but sadly not offered year round. I highly recommend this restaurant! It's super cute and perfect for a date or for hanging out with friends.
